languages.text: "Группа рабочих в красных шарфах была замечена в отсеке сразу после атаки на святилище. Бригадир заявил, что они были на работах на транспортной магистрали. Ни пороха на одежде, ни свежих ран. Слишком многие стали носить красные повязки, и это путает след. Но позже мы обнаружили в одном из измельчителей красные платки и окровавленное тряпье".

traits.locale_text: "Группа рабочих в красных шарфах была замечена в отсеке сразу после атаки на святилище. У всех было твердое алиби и отсутствовали следы борьбы. Ни пороха на одежде, ни свежих ран. Слишком многие стали носить красные повязки, и это путало след. Но мы все же обнаружили зацепку в одном из измельчителей — красные платки и окровавленное тряпье".

languages.text: "A group of workers wearing red scarves were seen in the compartment just after the attack on the shrine. The foreman stated that they were at work on the freight line. No gunpowder on their clothes, no fresh wounds. Too many of them have started wearing red masks, and it muddles the trail. But we also found some red scarves and bloody rags in one of the shredders only shortly afterward."
languages.original_text: "Группа рабочих в красных шарфах была замечена в отсеке сразу после атаки на святилище. Бригадир заявил, что они были на работах на транспортной магистрали. Ни пороха на одежде, ни свежих ран. Слишком многие стали носить красные повязки, и это путает след. Но позже мы обнаружили в одном из измельчителей красные платки и окровавленное тряпье".

traits.locale_text: "A group of workers wearing red scarves were seen in the compartment just after the attack on the shrine. The foreman stated that they were at work on the cargo lane. No gunpowder on their clothes, no fresh wounds. Too many started wearing red armbands, and it muddles the trail. But we found red handkerchiefs and bloody rags in one of the grinders a short time later."

languages.text: "Eine Gruppe von Arbeitern mit roten Schals wurde kurz nach dem Angriff auf den Schrein in dem Modul gesehen. Der Vorarbeiter sagte, sie würden an der Güterstrecke arbeiten. An ihrer Kleidung befand sich kein Schießpulver und sie wiesen keine frischen Wunden auf. Zu viele von ihnen haben begonnen, rote Masken zu tragen, das verwischt die Spur. Wir haben jedoch kurz darauf auch in einem der Shredder rote Schals und blutige Lumpen gefunden."
languages.original_text: "A group of workers wearing red scarves were seen in the compartment just after the attack on the shrine. The foreman stated that they were at work on the freight line. No gunpowder on their clothes, no fresh wounds. Too many of them have started wearing red masks, and it muddles the trail. But we also found some red scarves and bloody rags in one of the shredders only shortly afterward."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Gruppe von Arbeitern mit roten Schals wurde kurz nach dem Angriff auf den Schrein in dem Modul gesehen. Der Vorarbeiter sagte, sie würden an der Güterstrecke arbeiten. An ihrer Kleidung befand sich kein Schießpulver und sie wiesen keine frischen Wunden auf. Zu viele von ihnen haben begonnen, rote Masken zu tragen, das verwischt die Spur. Wir haben jedoch kurz darauf auch in einem der Shredder rote Schals und blutige Lumpen gefunden."

languages.text: «Se avistó a un grupo de trabajadores con bufandas rojas en el compartimento justo después del ataque contra el templo. El capataz dijo que estaban trabajando en la línea de carga. No hay pólvora en su ropa ni heridas recientes. Muchos han empezado a usar máscaras rojas, y eso oscurece el rastro. Pero poco después también encontramos bufandas rojas y harapos ensangrentados».
languages.original_text: "A group of workers wearing red scarves were seen in the compartment just after the attack on the shrine. The foreman stated that they were at work on the freight line. No gunpowder on their clothes, no fresh wounds. Too many of them have started wearing red masks, and it muddles the trail. But we also found some red scarves and bloody rags in one of the shredders only shortly afterward."

traits.locale_text: «Se avistó a un grupo de trabajadores con bufandas rojas en el compartimento justo después del ataque contra el templo. El capataz dijo que estaban trabajando en la línea de carga. No hay pólvora en su ropa ni heridas recientes. Muchos han empezado a usar máscaras rojas, y eso oscurece el rastro. Pero poco después también encontramos bufandas rojas y harapos ensangrentados».

languages.text: 「神殿が襲撃された直後、赤いスカーフをまいた労働者の一団が区画内で目撃されました。作業長によると、彼らは貨物線で仕事をしていたようです。彼らの服に火薬はついておらず、生傷もない。余りにも多くの人間が赤いマスクをつけ始めたせいで、足取りが混乱させられています。けれどその直後、シュレッダーの1つで赤いスカーフと血まみれの布切れも見つけたのです」
languages.original_text: "A group of workers wearing red scarves were seen in the compartment just after the attack on the shrine. The foreman stated that they were at work on the freight line. No gunpowder on their clothes, no fresh wounds. Too many of them have started wearing red masks, and it muddles the trail. But we also found some red scarves and bloody rags in one of the shredders only shortly afterward."

traits.locale_text: 「神殿が襲撃された直後、赤いスカーフをまいた労働者の一団が区画内で目撃されました。作業長によると、彼らは貨物線で仕事をしていたようです。彼らの服に火薬はついておらず、生傷もない。余りにも多くの人間が赤いマスクをつけ始めたせいで、足取りが混乱させられています。けれどその直後、シュレッダーの1つで赤いスカーフと血まみれの布切れも見つけたのです」

languages.text: “圣殿遭到袭击之后，有人看到一群戴着红色头巾的工人出现在船舱里。领班说那些人在货运区域工作，身上没有火药的痕迹，也没有新的伤口。有太多太多工人戴起了红色的头巾，这让我们失去了目标。但没过多久，我们在其中一台粉碎机里找到了几条红头巾，还有沾着血的破布。”
languages.original_text: "A group of workers wearing red scarves were seen in the compartment just after the attack on the shrine. The foreman stated that they were at work on the freight line. No gunpowder on their clothes, no fresh wounds. Too many of them have started wearing red masks, and it muddles the trail. But we also found some red scarves and bloody rags in one of the shredders only shortly afterward."

traits.locale_text: “圣殿遭到袭击之后，有人看到一群戴着红色头巾的工人出现在船舱里。领班说那些人在货运区域工作，身上没有火药的痕迹，也没有新的伤口。有太多太多工人戴起了红色的头巾，这让我们失去了目标。但没过多久，我们在其中一台粉碎机里找到了几条红头巾，还有沾着血的破布。”

languages.text: « Un groupe d'ouvriers arborant des foulards rouges a été aperçu dans le compartiment juste avant l'attaque du sanctuaire. D'après le contremaître, ils travaillaient sur la ligne de fret. Leurs vêtements ne portaient aucune trace de poudre, et aucun n'était blessé. Mais bon nombre d'entre eux ont commencé à porter des masques rouges, ce qui a brouillé les pistes. Cela dit, nous avons également trouvé des foulards rouges et des chiffons imbibés de sang dans l'un des lacérateurs peu après l'incident. »
languages.original_text: "A group of workers wearing red scarves were seen in the compartment just after the attack on the shrine. The foreman stated that they were at work on the freight line. No gunpowder on their clothes, no fresh wounds. Too many of them have started wearing red masks, and it muddles the trail. But we also found some red scarves and bloody rags in one of the shredders only shortly afterward."

traits.locale_text: « Un groupe d'ouvriers arborant des foulards rouges a été aperçu dans le compartiment juste avant l'attaque du sanctuaire. D'après le contremaître, ils travaillaient sur la ligne de fret. Leurs vêtements ne portaient aucune trace de poudre, et aucun n'était blessé. Mais bon nombre d'entre eux ont commencé à porter des masques rouges, ce qui a brouillé les pistes. Cela dit, nous avons également trouvé des foulards rouges et des chiffons imbibés de sang dans l'un des lacérateurs peu après l'incident. »

languages.text: "Mabede yapılan saldırının hemen sonrasında bölmede kırmızı atkı takan bir grup işçi görüldü. Ustabaşı, saldırı esnasında yük hattında çalıştıklarını belirtti. Ne kıyafetlerinde barut kalıntısı ne de bedenlerinde yeni açılmış yaralar mevcut. Pek çoğu kırmızı maskeler takmaya başlamış, bu da izi takip etmeyi zorlaştırıyor. Ancak kısa bir süre sonra parçalayıcıların birinde kırmızı atkılar ve kan içinde paçavralar da bulduk."
languages.original_text: "A group of workers wearing red scarves were seen in the compartment just after the attack on the shrine. The foreman stated that they were at work on the freight line. No gunpowder on their clothes, no fresh wounds. Too many of them have started wearing red masks, and it muddles the trail. But we also found some red scarves and bloody rags in one of the shredders only shortly afterward."
